# Module: tf.keras.models



Defined in [`tensorflow/python/keras/models/__init__.py`](https://www.github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/r1.4/tensorflow/python/keras/models/__init__.py).

Keras models API.

## Classes

[`class Model`](../../tf/keras/models/Model): The `Model` class adds training & evaluation routines to a `Container`.

[`class Sequential`](../../tf/keras/models/Sequential): Linear stack of layers.

## Functions

[`load_model(...)`](../../tf/keras/models/load_model): Loads a model saved via `save_model`.

[`model_from_config(...)`](../../tf/keras/models/model_from_config): Instantiates a Keras model from its config.

[`model_from_json(...)`](../../tf/keras/models/model_from_json): Parses a JSON model configuration file and returns a model instance.

[`model_from_yaml(...)`](../../tf/keras/models/model_from_yaml): Parses a yaml model configuration file and returns a model instance.

[`save_model(...)`](../../tf/keras/models/save_model): Save a model to a HDF5 file.
